author: Dr Clare Craig
description:
A new Lancet paper has drawn headlines suggesting Covid is a greater myocarditis risk to children than vaccination. Diagnostic pathologist Dr Clare Craig dissects the study and finds this conclusion seriously misleading.

The post All the Flaws in the Lancet Paper That Claims to Show Covid is a Greater Myocarditis Risk to Children Than Vaccination appeared first on The Daily Sceptic.
title: All the Flaws in the Lancet Paper That Claims to Show Covid is a Greater Myocarditis Risk to Children Than Vaccination

author: Will Jones
description:
The £10.5 billion cost of compensation for Waspi women – which Labour has said it is now considering paying out afresh – would wipe out the money raised by a 1p income tax rise, figures show.

The post Waspi Compensation Would Wipe Out 1p Income Tax Rise appeared first on The Daily Sceptic.
title: Waspi Compensation Would Wipe Out 1p Income Tax Rise

author: Anonymous former BBC staff member
description:
The BBC obviously leans heavily Left, says one former staff member, writing anonymously in the Daily Sceptic. But to the people who work there, their right-on views are just the 'normal' and 'objective' way to think.

The post The BBC’s Delusional Belief in its Objectivity appeared first on The Daily Sceptic.
title: The BBC’s Delusional Belief in its Objectivity

author: Joanna Gray
description:
Women are being told it's "uncool" and "Republican" to have a boyfriend, with some even cropping out their partners' heads on holiday snaps. This is not going to help the birth rate or women's happiness, says Joanna Gray.

The post Why Are Women Being Told Boyfriends Are ‘Uncool’ and ‘Republican’? appeared first on The Daily Sceptic.
title: Why Are Women Being Told Boyfriends Are ‘Uncool’ and ‘Republican’?

author: Will Jones
description:
Trust in the BBC has been collapsing for years. For many, it finally died during Covid when the national broadcaster took on the role of chief cheerleader for the lockdowns, no dissent allowed. A reckoning is long overdue.

The post A BBC Reckoning for the Covid Lockdowns is Overdue appeared first on The Daily Sceptic.
title: A BBC Reckoning for the Covid Lockdowns is Overdue

author: Chris Morrison
description:
It's been a very long time since the BBC even pretended to be impartial on climate change, says Chris Morrison. The truth is, decades of crying 'Fire!' in the climate theatre have left the BBC with net zero credibility.

The post Decades of Crying ‘Fire!’ in the Climate Theatre Have Left the BBC with Net Zero Credibility appeared first on The Daily Sceptic.
title: Decades of Crying ‘Fire!’ in the Climate Theatre Have Left the BBC with Net Zero Credibility

author: Tilak Doshi
description:
COP30 is Trump's Eisenhower moment, says Dr Tilak Doshi. Just as Eisenhower's Suez intervention ended Europe's pretensions to empire, Trump's energy realism is ending Brussels's grandiloquent claims to climate leadership.

The post Trump’s Eisenhower Moment: COP30 and the End of Europe’s Green Agenda appeared first on The Daily Sceptic.
title: Trump’s Eisenhower Moment: COP30 and the End of Europe’s Green Agenda

author: Richard Eldred
description:
A summary of the most interesting stories in the past 24 hours that challenge the prevailing orthodoxy about the ‘climate emergency’, public health ‘crises’ and the supposed moral defects of Western civilisation.

The post News Round-Up appeared first on The Daily Sceptic.
title: News Round-Up
